Text:
How could you upload a torrent when TPB have database problems which makes it impossible to upload?

"We're experiencing some issues with the database. Please try again soon."

Has been like that for 2 days now.

I Have A Facility Called DHT In uTorrent 1.6
What That Does Is If Site Or Tracker Is Down, You Still Proceed As Normal..

Eh..?? Try to write properly?

And read properly as well? I asked how you could upload, when TPB has problems with it's database which makes uploading a .torrent file impossible.

It's been going on for 3 days soon.

Ok, Your The Guy Who Has Problems Reading..
Let Me Explain, I Have uTorrent 1.6 For Uploading.
There Is A Funcion In The Software Called DHT (Distributed Hash Table, technical explanation) .

Read This:-
http://www.utorrent.com/faq.php#What_is_DHT.3F

Once You's Studied It Properly Then You Will Know What I Mean?
